segments.text: I notice the water spilling over the sink, creating a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stool looks like it’s about to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her share, not even caring about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a disaster, but the garden is so tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to slip and fall any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading fast, and she’s still not reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s hand is deep in the cookie jar, grabbing as many as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll ever get caught or if they’ll get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
